javascript_modules.title: JavaScript Core Concepts
javascript_modules.name: JS Core
javascript_modules.summary: Master the fundamental concepts of JavaScript including data types, variables, scope, and basic programming constructs.

javascript_modules.title: JavaScript Arrays
javascript_modules.name: Arrays
javascript_modules.summary: Learn array methods, manipulation techniques, and advanced array operations for data processing.

javascript_modules.title: JavaScript Functions
javascript_modules.name: Functions
javascript_modules.summary: Understand function declarations, expressions, arrow functions, closures, and advanced function concepts.

javascript_modules.title: JavaScript Objects
javascript_modules.name: Objects
javascript_modules.summary: Master object creation, manipulation, destructuring, and advanced object-oriented patterns.

javascript_modules.title: JavaScript Loops
javascript_modules.name: Loops
javascript_modules.summary: Learn all types of loops: for, while, do-while, for-in, for-of, and advanced iteration techniques.

javascript_modules.title: DOM Manipulation
javascript_modules.name: DOM
javascript_modules.summary: Master Document Object Model manipulation, element selection, styling, and dynamic content creation.

javascript_modules.title: Event Handling
javascript_modules.name: Events
javascript_modules.summary: Learn event listeners, event propagation, delegation, and creating interactive web applications.

javascript_modules.title: JavaScript Promises
javascript_modules.name: Promises
javascript_modules.summary: Master asynchronous JavaScript with Promises, async/await, and advanced asynchronous patterns.

javascript_modules.title: Object-Oriented Programming
javascript_modules.name: OOP
javascript_modules.summary: Learn classes, inheritance, encapsulation, polymorphism, and modern OOP patterns in JavaScript.

javascript_modules.title: Higher-Order Functions
javascript_modules.name: HOF
javascript_modules.summary: Master map, filter, reduce, and other higher-order functions for functional programming.

javascript_modules.title: API Integration
javascript_modules.name: API
javascript_modules.summary: Learn to work with REST APIs, fetch data, handle responses, and build API-driven applications.

javascript_modules.title: JavaScript Features
javascript_modules.name: Features
javascript_modules.summary: Explore advanced JavaScript features, modern syntax, and cutting-edge development techniques.

javascript_modules.title: ES6+ Modern JavaScript
javascript_modules.name: ES6+
javascript_modules.summary: Master modern JavaScript features: destructuring, spread operator, template literals, modules, and more.

javascript_modules.title: Error Handling
javascript_modules.name: Error Handling
javascript_modules.summary: Learn try-catch blocks, error types, debugging techniques, and building robust applications.

javascript_modules.title: Regular Expressions
javascript_modules.name: RegEx
javascript_modules.summary: Master pattern matching, text validation, and string manipulation with regular expressions.

javascript_modules.title: Local Storage & Session
javascript_modules.name: Storage
javascript_modules.summary: Learn browser storage options: localStorage, sessionStorage, cookies, and IndexedDB.

javascript_modules.title: Form Validation
javascript_modules.name: Forms
javascript_modules.summary: Master form handling, validation techniques, and creating user-friendly input experiences.

javascript_modules.title: AJAX & Fetch API
javascript_modules.name: AJAX
javascript_modules.summary: Learn asynchronous communication, XMLHttpRequest, Fetch API, and handling server responses.

javascript_modules.title: JSON Handling
javascript_modules.name: JSON
javascript_modules.summary: Master JSON parsing, stringifying, and working with structured data formats.

javascript_modules.title: Modules & Imports
javascript_modules.name: Modules
javascript_modules.summary: Learn ES6 modules, import/export syntax, and building modular JavaScript applications.

javascript_modules.title: Testing & Debugging
javascript_modules.name: Testing
javascript_modules.summary: Master debugging tools, unit testing, integration testing, and quality assurance techniques.

javascript_modules.title: Performance Optimization
javascript_modules.name: Performance
javascript_modules.summary: Learn optimization techniques, memory management, and building high-performance JavaScript applications.

javascript_modules.title: Design Patterns
javascript_modules.name: Patterns
javascript_modules.summary: Master common design patterns: Singleton, Observer, Factory, Module, and architectural patterns.

javascript_modules.title: Browser APIs
javascript_modules.name: APIs
javascript_modules.summary: Explore Geolocation, Canvas, WebRTC, Service Workers, and other powerful browser APIs.

javascript_modules.title: Animation & Graphics
javascript_modules.name: Animation
javascript_modules.summary: Learn CSS animations, Canvas drawing, SVG manipulation, and creating interactive graphics.

react_modules.title: React Core Concepts
react_modules.name: React Core
react_modules.summary: Master the fundamental concepts of React including components, JSX, props, and basic React patterns.

react_modules.title: React Components
react_modules.name: Components
react_modules.summary: Learn component creation, functional vs class components, and component composition techniques.

react_modules.title: React Hooks
react_modules.name: Hooks
react_modules.summary: Understand useState, useEffect, useContext, and custom hooks for modern React development.

react_modules.title: React State Management
react_modules.name: State
react_modules.summary: Master state management patterns, lifting state up, and advanced state handling techniques.

react_modules.title: React Event Handling
react_modules.name: Events
react_modules.summary: Learn React event system, event handlers, synthetic events, and form handling in React.

react_modules.title: React Router
react_modules.name: Router
react_modules.summary: Master client-side routing, navigation, route parameters, and nested routing in React applications.

react_modules.title: React Forms
react_modules.name: Forms
react_modules.summary: Learn controlled components, form validation, and advanced form handling patterns in React.

react_modules.title: React Context API
react_modules.name: Context
react_modules.summary: Master React Context for state management, avoiding prop drilling, and creating provider patterns.

react_modules.title: React Performance
react_modules.name: Performance
react_modules.summary: Learn React.memo, useMemo, useCallback, and optimization techniques for React applications.

react_modules.title: React Testing
react_modules.name: Testing
react_modules.summary: Master unit testing, integration testing, and testing React components with Jest and React Testing Library.

react_modules.title: React API Integration
react_modules.name: API
react_modules.summary: Learn to integrate REST APIs, handle async operations, and manage API state in React applications.

react_modules.title: React Styling
react_modules.name: Styling
react_modules.summary: Explore CSS modules, styled-components, CSS-in-JS, and modern styling approaches in React.

react_modules.title: React Redux
react_modules.name: Redux
react_modules.summary: Master Redux for state management, actions, reducers, and connecting React components to Redux store.

react_modules.title: React Error Handling
react_modules.name: Error Handling
react_modules.summary: Learn error boundaries, error handling patterns, and building robust React applications.

react_modules.title: React Patterns
react_modules.name: Patterns
react_modules.summary: Master common React patterns: HOCs, render props, compound components, and advanced patterns.

react_modules.title: React Lifecycle
react_modules.name: Lifecycle
react_modules.summary: Understand component lifecycle methods, useEffect patterns, and lifecycle management in React.

react_modules.title: React Custom Hooks
react_modules.name: Custom Hooks
react_modules.summary: Learn to create reusable custom hooks, hook patterns, and advanced hook composition techniques.

react_modules.title: React Portals
react_modules.name: Portals
react_modules.summary: Master React portals for rendering components outside the component tree, modals, and tooltips.

react_modules.title: React Refs
react_modules.name: Refs
react_modules.summary: Learn useRef, createRef, forwarding refs, and direct DOM manipulation in React applications.

react_modules.title: React Suspense
react_modules.name: Suspense
react_modules.summary: Understand React Suspense, lazy loading components, and handling loading states in React.

react_modules.title: React Server Components
react_modules.name: Server Components
react_modules.summary: Master React Server Components, server-side rendering, and modern React architecture patterns.

react_modules.title: React Animation
react_modules.name: Animation
react_modules.summary: Learn animation libraries, transitions, and creating smooth animations in React applications.

react_modules.title: React Accessibility
react_modules.name: Accessibility
react_modules.summary: Master accessibility patterns, ARIA attributes, and building inclusive React applications.

react_modules.title: React DevTools
react_modules.name: DevTools
react_modules.summary: Learn React DevTools, debugging techniques, and performance profiling for React applications.

react_modules.title: React Deployment
react_modules.name: Deployment
react_modules.summary: Master build processes, optimization, and deploying React applications to various platforms.
